title: Second round of counselling
content: I got ECE at first round of counselling but i wanted to try for AIML so i submitted the Xerox of adhaar and 4 photos they have asked to submit the originals before 12 July now if i submit it can i still opt for AIML if i get in second round ? Please help

comments.body: Yes you can , they basically refund you the fee difference if you claim different seat that's all
Oh so if I get AIML I just have to give 50k dd

They'll inform you the details on when to give the dd later, if you have already claimed seat in first round and you change branch in 2nd round you don't have to do the admission process again , that's what we were told
Oh ok thank you so much
I suggest you mail them and clarify tho , but afaik you should be able to claim another seat without doing admission process again.
I am going to pes on 8 I will just clarify it there
